meanings.definition: A person who does not migrate.
meanings.sent1: The nonmigrant lived in the same town all their life.
meanings.sent2: The nonmigrant prefers to stay in their hometown.
meanings.sent3: The nonmigrant joked that they had roots growing into the ground.
meanings.sent4: The nonmigrant was like a rock, unmoved by the winds of change.
meanings.sent5: The image of the nonmigrant sitting on their porch became a symbol of stability.

meanings.definition: Not migrating or moving from one place to another.
meanings.sent1: The nonmigrant community was tight-knit and familiar with each other.
meanings.sent2: The nonmigrant lifestyle was peaceful and consistent.
meanings.sent3: The nonmigrant tree seemed content to watch the world go by.
meanings.sent4: The nonmigrant sky remained constant, unlike the ever-changing clouds.
meanings.sent5: The nonmigrant river flowed steadily, never seeking a new path.
